titleStmt.title: An ingenious contention, by way of letter, between Mr. Wanly, a son of the Church; & Dr. Wild, a nonconformist.
titleStmt.author: Wanley, Nathaniel, 1634-1680.
Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "SO the bright Taper useless burns"; preceded by "Mr. Nathan Wanley to Dr. Wild, was laid aside for Nonconformity ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
